name: Hidden Image Landscape
description:
Hidden Image is a challenging visual photograph game. The objective is to find 5 images within an image under a given time.
This game is designed to improved your observation skills and attention to detail.
Extra features like Hints and Time Extended are provided to help you beat the clock.
Enjoy the beautiful imagery of world's best landscape while playing Hidden Image.

There are a 100 images to explore...

01 Aurora Borealis
02 Arizona
03 Anasazi Ruins
